facts.Name: Alabama
facts.KnownFor: Alabama is known for peanuts, cotton and agriculture industry, southern hospitality, the beautiful gulf coast beaches, its role in the Civil Rights Movement, and college football, especially the intra-state rivalry between University of Alabama and Auburn University.
facts.TouristAttractions: U.S. Space & Rocket Center, Birmingham Zoo and Huntsville Botanical Garden
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Manufacturing and Real Estate

facts.Name: Alaska
facts.KnownFor: Alaska is known for glaciers, national parks, the vast wilderness, Northern lights, midnight sun, fishing industry, oil industry, and cruises.
facts.TouristAttractions: Fairbanks, Glacier Bay National Park and Preserve and Ketchikan
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Mining, quarrying, and oil and gas extraction as well as Transportation

facts.Name: Arizona
facts.KnownFor: Arizona is known for the hot and dry desert climate, the Grand Canyon, the red rocks of Sedona, the Hoover Dam, the Saguaro cactus, and the Native American culture.
facts.TouristAttractions: Grand Canyon National Park, Canyon de Chelly National Monument and Monument Valley
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Real Estate as well as Professional and Business Services

facts.Name: Arkansas
facts.KnownFor: Arkansas is known for its lakes, rivers, and hot springs, extreme weather and frequent storms, rice and poultry production, its rich folk music tradition, and the only active diamond mine in the United States.
facts.TouristAttractions: Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art, Hot Springs National Park and Magic Springs and Crystal Falls Water and Theme Park
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Manufacturing as well as Professional and Business Services

facts.Name: California
facts.KnownFor: California is known for Hollywood, Silicon Valley, Disneyland, dry weather, surfing, less-than-ideal public transportation, the wine country region and bad traffic
facts.TouristAttractions: Yosemite National Park, San Francisco and the Golden Gate Bridge and Disneyland
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Real Estate as well as Professional and Business Services

facts.Name: Colorado
facts.KnownFor: Colorado is known for its high altitude, winter skiing, wildlife, mining industry, hot springs and spa towns and the majestic landscape of mountains, forests, and canyons
facts.TouristAttractions: Rocky Mountain National Park, Denver and Telluride
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Real Estate as well as Professional and Business Services

facts.Name: Connecticut
facts.KnownFor: Connecticut is known for its beautiful fall foliage, its cultural heritage, its manufacturing industry, Yale University, and being the home of ESPN, the famous American cable sports channel.
facts.TouristAttractions: Mystic Seaport Museum, Olde Mistick Village and The Mark Twain House
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Real Estate as well as Finance and Insurance

facts.Name: Delaware
facts.KnownFor: Delaware is known for historical landmarks, chemical manufacturing, being a tax-free state, the first state to ratify the Constitution, large number of companies incorporated in the state, agricultural industry and its financial industry, including the presence of many major credit card companies
facts.TouristAttractions: Rehoboth Beach, Delaware Seashore State Park and Dover
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Finance and Insurance as well as Real Estate

facts.Name: Florida
facts.KnownFor: Florida is known for theme parks, beaches, hurricanes, warm and humid weather, oranges and grapefruits, retiree communities and tourism
facts.TouristAttractions: Walt Disney World, Kennedy Space Center, Universal Studios, Miami Beach and the Art Deco Historic District
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Real Estate as well as Professional and Business Services

facts.Name: Georgia
facts.KnownFor: Georgia is known for warm, temperate climate, the 3 P's - Peaches, Peanuts, and Pecans, its lumber, resins, and turpentine, cotton, quail hunting and Coca-Cola
facts.TouristAttractions: Savannah, Tallulah Gorge State Park and Jekyll Island
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Real Estate as well as Professional and Business Services

facts.Name: Hawaii
facts.KnownFor: Hawaii is known for aloha shirts, luaus, the Hula dance, Lei, stunning beaches, volcanic activity, water sports, high cost of living, coffee, surfing and pineapple
facts.TouristAttractions: Pearl Harbor and USS Arizona Memorial, Na Pali Coast State Wilderness Park and Volcanoes National Park
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Real Estate and Entertainment

facts.Name: Idaho
facts.KnownFor: Idaho is known for potatoes, gems, scenic mountain landscapes, miles of protected wilderness, outdoor recreation areas, huckleberries, mining and hot springs
facts.TouristAttractions: Yellowstone National Park, Craters of the Moon and Shoshone Falls
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Real Estate as well as Manufacturing

facts.Name: Illinois
facts.KnownFor: Illinois is known for farmlands, corn, land of Trains, nuclear power plants, architecture and the first McDonald's
facts.TouristAttractions: Millennium Park & Cloud Gate, Navy Pier and Lincoln Park
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Professional and Business Services as well as Real Estate

facts.Name: Indiana
facts.KnownFor: Indiana is known for vast farmlands, agricultural production, especially corns and soybeans, the Indy 500, steel mills, limestone industry, university of Notre Dame and high school basketball
facts.TouristAttractions: The Children's Museum of Indianapolis, Indianapolis Motor Speedway Museum and Turkey Run State Park
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Manufacturing as well as Real Estate

facts.Name: Iowa
facts.KnownFor: Iowa is known for corn, pork Production, beautiful countryside and parks, unpredictable Weather and political Caucuses, as it holds the first caucus in every presidential primary election
facts.TouristAttractions: National Mississippi River Museum and Aquarium, State Capitol and Iowa State Fair
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Manufacturing as well as Finance and Insurance

facts.Name: Kansas
facts.KnownFor: Kansas is known for oil wells, The Wizard of Oz, wheat and cattle production, great plains and scorching summers and freezing winters
facts.TouristAttractions: Botanica, The Wichita Gardens,  Kansas State Capitol and Sedgwick County Zoo
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Manufacturing as well as Real Estate

facts.Name: Kentucky
facts.KnownFor: Kentucky is known for horse racing, famous bourbon distilleries, coal mining industry, college basketball, Kentucky Fried Chicken and bluegrass
facts.TouristAttractions: Kentucky Derby, Louisville Slugger Museum & Factory and Daniel Boone National Forest
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Manufacturing as well as Real Estate

facts.Name: Louisiana
facts.KnownFor: Louisiana is known for Mardi Gras, jazz music, Creole and Cajun cuisine, salt mines amd the petroleum industry
facts.TouristAttractions: New Orleans' French Quarter, National WWII Museum and Mardi Gras
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Manufacturing as well as Real Estate

facts.Name: Maine
facts.KnownFor: Maine is known for lobsters, lighthouses, rocky coastlines, moose, blueberries and delicious seafood
facts.TouristAttractions: Acadia National Park & Mount Desert Island, The Old Port and Portland Head Lighthouse and Marginal Way and Ogunquit Beaches
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Real Estate as well as Education and Healthcare

facts.Name: Maryland
facts.KnownFor: Maryland is known for blue crabs, birthplace of the U.S. National Anthem, the twin spans of the Chesapeake Bay Bridge, fishing, proximity to Washington D.C.
facts.TouristAttractions: Fort McHenry National Monument, National Aquarium and The Walters Art Museum
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Real Estate as well as Professional and Business Services

facts.Name: Massachusetts
facts.KnownFor: Massachusetts is known for the landing place of the Mayflower and the Pilgrims, stunning fall foliage, colonial landmarks, top educational institutions: Harvard University and Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) and the nation's first library
facts.TouristAttractions: Freedom Trail, Cape Cod Beaches and Boston Common and Public Garden Swan Boats
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Professional and Business Services as well as Real Estate

facts.Name: Michigan
facts.KnownFor: Michigan is known for fishing, cold and snowy winter, automobile industry, lakes and the agricultural industry, particularly cherries, apples, and blueberries
facts.TouristAttractions: Mackinac Island, Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore and Lake Michigan and Detroit Institute of Arts
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Manufacturing as well as Professional and Business Services

facts.Name: Minnesota
facts.KnownFor: Minnesota is known for lakes, mining (iron, copper, nickel), largest shopping mall in the U.S. and cold winters
facts.TouristAttractions: Superior National Forest & Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness, North Shore Scenic Drive and Paddle Voyageurs National Park
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Manufacturing as well as Professional and Business Services

facts.Name: Mississippi
facts.KnownFor: Mississippi is known for catfish, cotton, abundance of wildlife, including turkey, deer, and alligators, bluegrass music and Southern charm
facts.TouristAttractions: Gulf Islands National Seashore, Tupelo Automobile Museum and USS Cairo Museum
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Manufacturing as well as Real Estate

facts.Name: Missouri
facts.KnownFor: Missouri is known for Ozark Mountains, prairies, scenic rivers, Italian food and Mark Twain
facts.TouristAttractions: St. Louis Gateway Arch, Music in Branson and Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Professional and Business Services as well as Manufacturing

facts.Name: Montana
facts.KnownFor: Montana is known for Yellowstone National Park, Bighorn Mountains, wildlife, sapphires, rich deposits of minerals, particularly copper, gold, and silver
facts.TouristAttractions: Glacier National Park, Big Sky Resort and Grizzly and Wolf Discovery Center
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Real Estate as well as Education and Healthcare

facts.Name: Nebraska
facts.KnownFor: Nebraska is known for agricultural production, corn, beef production, Warren Buffett and the home of the College Baseball World Series
facts.TouristAttractions: Omaha's Henry Doorly Zoo and Aquarium, Old Market in Omaha and Strategic Air Command and Space Museum
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Manufacturing as well as Finance and Insurance

facts.Name: Nevada
facts.KnownFor: Nevada is known for gambling, large and extravagent hotels, hot and dry weather, rich silver deposits, Hoover Dam and Area 51
facts.TouristAttractions: Las Vegas, Hoover Dam and Lake Tahoe
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Entertainment as well as Real Estate

facts.Name: New Hampshire
facts.KnownFor: New Hampshire is known for small, picturesque towns, abundant wildlife, large stretches of wilderness and popular destinations for skiing and hiking
facts.TouristAttractions: Mt. Washington Cog Railway, The Flume Gorge and Franconia Notch and Mt. Washington Auto Road
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Real Estate as well as Professional and Business Services

facts.Name: New Jersey
facts.KnownFor: New Jersey is known for busy expressway, beautiful beaches, Italian population, pork roll and industrial production, particularly in chemical, pharmaceutical, and food processing industries
facts.TouristAttractions: Atlantic City's Boardwalk, Liberty State Park and Island Beach State Park
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Professional and Business Services as well as Real Estate

facts.Name: New Mexico
facts.KnownFor: New Mexico is known for diverse landscape, birthplace of the nuclear bomb, Ancient Pueblo People, Los Alamos National Laboratory, The Roswell Incident, white sands, pecans and Chile peppers
facts.TouristAttractions: Carlsbad Caverns National Park, White Sands National Monument and Albuquerque International Balloon Fiesta
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Real Estate as well as Professional and Business Services

facts.Name: New York
facts.KnownFor: New York is known for the Statue of Liberty, Wall Street, Time Square, broadway Shows, Central Park, tall Skyscrapers and famous performance venues such as Carnegie Hall and Lincoln Center
facts.TouristAttractions: Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island, Niagara Falls, Central Park and Times Square
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Finance and Insurance as well as Real Estate

facts.Name: North Carolina
facts.KnownFor: North Carolina is known for first flight by Wright Brothers, college basketball, Biltmore Estate - The largest private residence in the United States, beaches and tobacco production
facts.TouristAttractions: Blue Ridge Parkway, Beaches of the Outer Banks and The Biltmore Estate
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Manufacturing as well as Professional and Business Services

facts.Name: North Dakota
facts.KnownFor: North Dakota is known for scenic landscapes, oil and gas production, largest producer of honey, Native American culture
facts.TouristAttractions: Theodore Roosevelt National Park, National Buffalo Museum and North Dakota Heritage Center
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Mining, quarrying, and oil and gas extraction as well as Real Estate

facts.Name: Ohio
facts.KnownFor: Ohio is known for American football, rock and roll, roller coasters, corn and steel and rubber production
facts.TouristAttractions: Rock & Roll Hall of Fame, National Museum of the US Air Force and Cedar Point Amusement Park
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Manufacturing as well as Professional and Business Services

facts.Name: Oklahoma
facts.KnownFor: Oklahoma is known for American football, oil production, agriculture, particularly wheat, cattle, and oil seeds and tornadoes
facts.TouristAttractions: Route 66, Oklahoma City Zoo and Philbrook Museum of Art
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Mining, quarrying, and oil and gas extraction as well as Real Estate

facts.Name: Oregon
facts.KnownFor: Oregon is known for the Oregon Trail, wild west past, wildlife, diverse, scenic landscape and wineries and vineyards in the Willamette Valley
facts.TouristAttractions: Crater Lake National Park, Columbia River Gorge National Scenic Area and Cannon Beach
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Real Estate as well as Manufacturing

facts.Name: Pennsylvania
facts.KnownFor: Pennsylvania is known for the Declaration of Independence, Liberty Bell, Amish country, rolling mountains and Hershey's Chocolate
facts.TouristAttractions: Independence National Park and the Liberty Bell, Hershey Park and Gettysburg National Military Park
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Professional and Business Services as well as Education and Healthcare

facts.Name: Rhode Island
facts.KnownFor: Rhode Island is known for spectacular coastline, seaside colonial towns, jewelry design, textile manufacturing and Newport Jazz Festival
facts.TouristAttractions: The Breakers, Cliff Walk and Roger Williams Park Zoo
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Real Estate as well as Education and Healthcare

facts.Name: South Carolina
facts.KnownFor: South Carolina is known for beaches, fishing and hunting, golf courses, historic districts, lowcountry cuisine and the first state to succeed from the Union, leading to the Civil War
facts.TouristAttractions: Charleston's Historic District, Myrtle Beach and South Carolina Plantation Gardens
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Manufacturing as well as Real Estate

facts.Name: South Dakota
facts.KnownFor: South Dakota is known for Mount Rushmore, agriculture, Native American culture and The Black Hills Gold Rush of the late 19th century
facts.TouristAttractions: Mount Rushmore National Monument, Custer State Park and Badlands National Park
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Finance and Insurance as well as Education and Healthcare

facts.Name: Tennessee
facts.KnownFor: Tennessee is known for country music, whiskey, Graceland and Elvis and Tennessee whiskey
facts.TouristAttractions: The Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Graceland and Dollywood
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Manufacturing as well as Professional and Business Services

facts.Name: Texas
facts.KnownFor: Texas is known for hot weather, cowboy culture, ranching and cattle, oil production, The Alamo and NASA
facts.TouristAttractions: San Antonio's River Walk, The Alamo and Space Center Houston
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Manufacturing as well as Professional and Business Services

facts.Name: Utah
facts.KnownFor: Utah is known for The Great Salt Lake, the largest salt water lake in the Western Hemisphere, skiing, National parks, mormons and Sundance Film Festival
facts.TouristAttractions: Zion National Park, Arches National Park and Monument Valley
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Real Estate as well as Professional and Business Services

facts.Name: Vermont
facts.KnownFor: Vermont is known for small towns and covered bridges, green mountains, farms, wineries and breweries, Ben & Jerry's and maple syrup
facts.TouristAttractions: Stowe, Church Street Marketplace and Hildene
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Real Estate as well as Education and Healthcare

facts.Name: Virginia
facts.KnownFor: Virginia is known for Appalachian Trail, The Arlington National Cemetery, Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel, presidential homes, Capital of the Confederacy, Jamestown, the first permanent English settlement in the Americas
facts.TouristAttractions: Shenandoah National Park and Skyline Drive, Colonial Williamsburg and Virginia Beach
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Professional and Business Services as well as Real Estate

facts.Name: Washington
facts.KnownFor: Washington is known for beautiful scenery, agriculture, birthplace of Starbucks, aerospace industry and home of Boeing and home of high tech giants Microsoft and Amazon
facts.TouristAttractions: Olympic National Park, Seattle Center and the Space Needle and San Juan Islands
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Real Estate as well as Information

facts.Name: West Virginia
facts.KnownFor: West Virginia is known for scenic mountain beauty, coal mining industry, outdoor adventure opportunities and historic sites
facts.TouristAttractions: Blackwater Falls State Park, Monongahela National Forest and Seneca Rocks and The Greenbrier
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Education and Healthcare as well as Manufacturing

facts.Name: Wisconsin
facts.KnownFor: Wisconsin is known for cheese, dairy production, beer, cold winters, outdoor activities and Native American culture
facts.TouristAttractions: Oshkosh, Frank Lloyd Wright's Perfect Country Home and Wisconsin State Capitol
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Manufacturing and Real Estate

facts.Name: Wyoming
facts.KnownFor: Wyoming is known for Yellowstone National Park, Devil's Tower, diverse wildlife, hot springs, oil and gas production and the harsh environment
facts.TouristAttractions: Yellowstone National Park, Grand Teton National Park and Jackson
facts.TopPerformingIndustries: Mining, quarrying, and oil and gas extraction as well as Real Estate
